title: Man Booker Prize 2014 longlist
description:
Fiction

Age of Iron - JM Coetzee
Alexandria Quartet, The - Lawrence Durrell
Ancestor Stones - Aminatta Forna
Before She Met Me - Julian Barnes
Bend in the river, A - VS Naipaul
Big breasts and wide hips - Mo Yan
Blazing world, The - Siri Hustvedt
Bone clocks, The - David Mitchell
Chemistry of tears, The - Peter Carey
Civil servant's notebook - Wang Xiaofang
Conversation in the cathedral - Mario Vargas Llosa
Cross channel - Julian Barnes
Crossing the river - Caryl Philips
Distant shore, A - Caryl Philips
Dog, The - Joseph O'Neill
First love, last rites - Ian McEwan
Flaubert's parrot - Julian Barnes
Foe - JM Coetzee
Garlic ballads, The - Mo Yan
Grass is singing, The - Doris Lessing
Guerillas - VS Naipaul
Her lover (Belle du Seigneur) - Albert Cohen
History of the rain - Niall Williams
History of the world in 10 1/2 chapters, A - Julian Barnes
Honeymoon - Patrick Modiano
How to be both - Ali Smith
In a free state - VS Naipaul
Inheritance of loss, The - Kiran Desai
J - Howard Jacobson
John Saturnall's feast - Lawrence Norfolk
Levels of life - Julian Barnes
Life and death are wearing me out - Mo Yan
Lives of others - Neel Mukherjee
Memory of love - Aminatta Forna
Metroland - Julian Barnes
Narrow road to the deep north, The - Richard Flanagan
Night rounds - Patrick Modiano
Nothing to be frightened of - Julian Barnes
Orchard keeper, The - Cormac McCarthy
Orfeo - Richard Powers
Out of the dark - Patrick Modiano
Red sorghum - Mo Yan
Republic of wine, The - Mo Yan
Shifu, you'll do anything for a laugh - Mo Yan
Silent house - Orhan Pamuk
Small hotel, A - Robert Olen Butler
Solo - Rana Dasgupta
Song of Achilles - Madeline Miller
Sorry Please Thank you - Charles Yu
Staring at the sun - Julian Barnes
Through the window: Seventeen essays and a short story - Julian Barnes
To rise again at a decent hour - Joshua Ferris
Too much happiness - Alice Munro
Us - David Nicholls
Wake, The - Paul Kingsnorth
Way in the world, A - VS Naipaul
We are all completely beside ourselves - Karen Joy Fowler
We were the Mulvaneys - Joyce Carol Oates
Winter Journal - Paul Auster

Non-fiction

Billion wicked thoughts, A - What the world's largest experiment reveals about human desire
Among the believers - VS Naipaul
Arab Uprising, The: The unfinished revolutions of the new Middle East - Marc Lynch
Between Father and Son (Family letters) - VS Naipaul
Bitter sea, The - Charles N. Li
Charisma myth, The - Olivia Fox Cabane
China, A history - John Keay
China witness - Xinran
Colors of the mountain - Da Chen
Compass of pleasure - David J. Linden
Foundation - History of England from the beginnings to the Tudors - Peter Ackroyd
Imagist poem, The - William Pratt
India - A wounded civilization - VS Naipaul
J.Edgar Hoover and Clyde Tolson - Darwin Porter
Literary occasions (Essays) - VS Naipaul
Loss of El Dorado, The - VS Naipaul
Man on Mao's right, The - Ji Chaozhu
Mao's war against Nature - Judith Shapiro (pdf)
Middle Passage, The - VS Naipaul
My name is Number 4 - Ting-Xing Ye
New Depression, The - Richard Duncan
Social conquest of earth, The - Edward O. Wilson
Sound foundations (2005) - Adrian Underhill (pdf)
Storytelling animal, The - How stories make us human - Jonathan Gottshall
Subliminal: How your unconscious mind rules your behavior - Leonard Mlodinow
Tragedy of great power politics, The (Second edition) - John J. Mearsheimer
Turn in the south - VS Naipaul
Writer and the world, The - VS Naipaul
Writer's people, A - VS Naipaul
Your brain - The missing manual - Matthew McDonald (pdf)
You're looking very well - The surprising nature of getting old - Lewis Wolpert

**********************************

Remarks:

1: To help people download some or all of the above titles, I would appreciate it if you could keep the torrent alive by seeding it for at least an hour after you have finished. Thanks for your co-operation.

2: I personally OCRed the PDF format of Patrick Modiano's titles so that they are suitable to be compiled into both EPUB and MOBI formats. If you find typos in them, please leave your comments. I will see to it the typos are fixed.

3: Not all of the above titles are available in both EPUB and MOBI formats. To convert from one format to the other, you may wish to use a free open-source software such as Calibre
